parameters.name: DomainName
parameters.description:
The domain name that is used as a keyword to filter domain names. Fuzzy match is supported.

> 

*   If you set LiveDomainType to liveVideo and leave this parameter empty, the streaming domains are queried. - If you set LiveDomainType to liveEdge and leave this parameter empty, the ingest domains are queried.

parameters.name: DomainSearchType
parameters.description:
The search mode. Valid values:

*   **fuzzy_match** (default): fuzzy match
*   **pre_match**: prefix match
*   **suf_match**: suffix match
*   **full_match**: exact match

parameters.name: DomainStatus
parameters.description:
The status of the domain name. Valid values:

*   **online**
*   **offline**
*   **configuring**

parameters.name: LiveDomainType
parameters.description:
The type of the domain name. Valid values:

*   **liveVideo**: streaming domain
*   **liveEdge**: ingest domain

>  If you leave this parameter empty, all ingest domains and streaming domains within your Alibaba Cloud account are queried by default.

parameters.name: PageNumber
parameters.description: The page number. Valid values: **1 to 100000**.

parameters.name: PageSize
parameters.description: The number of entries per page. Default value: **20**. Maximum value: **50**.

parameters.name: RegionName
parameters.description: The ID of the region in which the domain name resides.

parameters.name: ResourceGroupId
parameters.description: The ID of the resource group.
